title: Modern Banjarmasin Airport Stay with Restaurant, Spa & Lagoon Pool
description:
Experience the vibrant city of Banjarmasin from the comfort of this sleek hotel. Located just minutes from Syamsudin Noor Airport, this stay also offers an excellent base to explore the city's bustling floating markets and the mesmerising Martapura Diamond Mine.

Savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at the hotel's onsite restaurant, indulge in treatments at the spa or take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool. For a touch of local culture, the historic Sabilal Muhtadin Mosque is a short drive away.
offer_address: Jalan Ahmad Yani Km 27 No 1A Landasan Ulin Kota Banjar Baru, Banjarmasin 70724 Indonesia
